title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow employers a credit against income tax for employing members of the Ready Reserve and National Guard and veterans recently separated from the Armed Forces.
content: Hiring Heroes Tax Incentive Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow employers a tax credit for up to 15 of the first $10,000 of wages paid to a Ready Reserve-National Guard employee or a recently-separated veteran . Terminates such credit after 2012.
